column5: Went out for the morning on the river for some smallmouth. Found that it was extremely shallow and there wasn't too many bass. Only caught about a dozen or so with only a couple nice ones. Mostly the usual 8-10 inchers. It was a nice day to be floating down though.   This is one of the usual small ones   I decided to bring home a couple of the nice ones   It wasn't nearly as fun as last weekend when we went out but still a nice morning.
Nice report man.  Enjoy your dinner!  Corn Nug
a very good day if you ask me!  gorgeous river.  is it the grand?
Looks like a better way to spend the day than I did  Good stuff  Maureen
Ya it's the grand. It is beautiful out there. Usually see a few deer on the journey and today watched a mother guide it's baby across the river.
